content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
stopped by on a sunday around 2 pm and we were seated immediately. we got the kimchi/pork mandu, original yuk gae jang with fresh pasta, and naengmyeon and everything was delicious! the broth of both the naengmyeon and yuk gae jang were sooo good with the vegetables/add ins of the dishes and the dumplings were super flavorful. everything was super fresh and the side dishes served with them paired well. imo great place for a quick and reasonably priced comfort meal in ktown!*there is a small parking lot and there was plenty of spots when we went.*
